mapper.select:
select t1.*,t2.name as hbm_prom_next_grp_name,t3.name as hbm_next_blocked_grp_name, t4.name as hbm_next_nobal_grp_name from tbl_grp t1 left join tbl_grp t2 on (t2.uuid=t1.hbm_prom_next_grp) left join tbl_grp t3 on (t3.uuid=t1.hbm_next_blocked_grp) left join tbl_grp t4 on (t4.uuid=t1.hbm_next_nobal_grp) where t1.rec_status!=2 and t1.domain_uuid=#{domainUuid}
order by ${orderByClause}
